version_description:
- PLEASE SEE NOTE AT END OF WHAT'S NEW TEXT
- Added support for custom text colors on the wake-up panel. Uses sliders to provide unlimited color choices.
- Added a customizable wake-up message.
- Added import of phone numbers & email addresses into the Notes field from the Address Book (Contacts).
- Added a Restore Purchase button for reactivating a previous purchase of the Extras Package (on the same device and/or other devices that share the same iTunes account).
- Fixed the Silent Mode titlebar icon to work properly.
- Added an optional Silent Mode alert when you exit Alarmed. This can be turned on or off via Settings | General.
- Plus lots of small enhancements, fine-tuning and bug-fixes.

IMPORTANT NOTE: The 2.1.1 update broke Sleep Timers (they will stop when the screen locks and external audio mode won't stop audio properly). A temporary workaround for regular sleep timers is to go to Settings | By Alarm Type | Wake-Up Panel Auto-Lock and turn Sleep Timer Active to ON. This will keep your screen from locking while the sleep timer is active as long as the wake-up panel is showing. Unfortunately there isn't a workaround for the problem with external audio mode. A bugfix update has been submitted and should be out soon. Thanks for your patience!

- Added a "Tomorrow" section to the reminder list display.
- Alarmed now remembers the last selected view (reminders, timers or wake-up) on cold start.
- A new option to include auto-complete DayMinders in the app icon badge count (default is off)
- Plus lots of small enhancements, fine-tuning and bug-fixes.

** NOTE: If you are enjoying Alarmed, please leave a new rating on the App Store. It really means a lot!

• Design refresh for iOS 7.
• Major improvements to Alarmed iCloud Sync for iOS 7 (easier setup, faster sync, more reliable).
• Supports Background App Refresh, a new feature of iOS 7 which helps keep your devices in sync with each other.
• Many bug fixes and small enhancements.
• 4.0.3 fixes several bugs in the 4.0 release.

NOTE: Alarmed retains support for iOS 5 & 6, but the codebase and design remain largely unchanged for these older versions of iOS. It is recommended that you update to iOS 7 for the best experience with Alarmed.

** If you are enjoying Alarmed, please leave a new rating in the App Store. It really means a lot!

• iOS 9 optimizations, including support for Slide Over and Split View
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Please spread the word to your friends and be sure to write a review (or just rate it) on the App Store if you are so inclined ... it is greatly appreciated!
